Network connections from suspicious proc.Action: Identify outbound network connections (Zeek conn.log) originating from suspicious process creations (Windows Event ID 4688). Analyze destination IPs/domains for rarity or association with known malicious infrastructure using threat intelligence. Calculate frequency of connections to external destinations per process/host and flag low-frequency destinations.

Multiple distinct outbound network conne.Action: Group Zeek conn.log entries by source host and process name (correlating with Windows Event ID 4688). Analyze the distribution of distinct external destination IP addresses/domains contacted by each process. Flag processes exhibiting a high number of distinct external destinations over a short or extended period using entropy measures or descriptive statistics (count distinct destinations).
